room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Q: The Live Escape Experience in Fort Collins
room_description:
Malveaux the Magnificent puts on a show to “contact the spirits” in the manner of old time spiritualists.

But things don’t go quite as planned for Malveaux leading to surprises for his guests…

Something has gone wrong.

You must search Malveaux’s shabby theater, unravel his flimflam, and find the real magic.

Investigate the huckster, restore balance, and escape to safety.
